page.title: 08Local Democracy in New Deer
page.content: The people in New Deer and district are represented in central and local government as follows:{Member of {Parliament},Albert McQuarrie, (Conservative),for East Aberdeenshire constituency;{Grampian Regional {Councillor},Dr.Margaret McGregor, (Conservative),for Deer ward;{Banff {and Buchan District Councillor}, Sally Cowley,(Conservative),for Deer ward. The village and its surrounding are also have several representatives on the non-executive{Deer Community {Council}and{New Deer Community {Association}which frequently makes representations to local government about issues of concern to the local population.
